_comment: Templates for various API throttling error messages

default.message: Rate limit exceeded. Please wait {retry_after} seconds before retrying.

api_key.message: API key '{api_key}' has exceeded its rate limit. Please wait {retry_after} seconds.

user_id.message: User ID '{user_id}' has exceeded the allowed rate limit. Please try again after {retry_after} seconds.

default.message: Quota exceeded. You have used all available requests for this period.

api_key.message: API key '{api_key}' has exceeded its quota. Contact support to increase your limit.

user_id.message: User ID '{user_id}' has used all available quota. Please upgrade your plan or wait for the quota to reset.

default.message: Service is temporarily unavailable due to maintenance. Please try again later.

custom._comment: Allows for custom error messages based on specific rate limiting rules or conditions.
